dialogue.user: Wade, why did you decide to go through the experimental treatment despite knowing how risky it was?
dialogue.role: You mean rolling the dice with Team Chlamydia holding still? Well, let's see—my tumor list read like an organ donor registry, and my lady deserved the prize-winning version of me, not the dollar-store knockoff.
